charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F--CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - On or about 1/1/2015, in the county of Macon, the defendant attempted to possess with the intent to distribute a controlled substance in violation of 21:841(a)(1), 21:841(b)(1)(C), 21:813; Conspiracy to distribute controlled substances in violation of 21:846.

21:841A=CD.F: CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - On or about September 15, 2014, the Defendant did knowingly and intentionally attempt to possess with the intent to distribute a Schedule I Controlled Substance commonly referred to as "AB-FUBINACA" in violation of 21:846, 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C).(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 60 months imprisonment on each of Counts 1 and 4, to run concurrently; 3 year term of Supervised Release on each of Counts 1 and 4, to run concurrently; and $200 special assessment. Oral Motion by Government granted as to dismissal of Counts 2 and 3 of the Indictment.

charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F: CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - On or about May 10, 2016, the Defendant did knowingly and intentionally possess with the intent to distribute a Schedule I Controlled Substance commonly referred to as "XLR11" in violation of 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C).(4)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 60 months imprisonment on each of Counts 1 and 4, to run concurrently; 3 year term of Supervised Release on each of Counts 1 and 4, to run concurrently; and $200 special assessment. Oral Motion by Government granted as to dismissal of Counts 2 and 3 of the Indictment.

charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F: CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - On December 5, 2014, the Defendant did knowingly and intentionally distribute a Schedule I Controlled Substance commonly referred to as "FUB-PB-22" in violation of 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C).(2)

21:841A=CD.F: CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - On or about May 10, 2016, the Defendant did knowingly and intentionally possess with the intent to distribute a Schedule I Controlled Substance commonly referred to as "FUB AMB" in violation of 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C).(3)
